# RelativeDateTimeFormatter.DateTimeStyle.named

**Case**

A style that uses named styles to describe relative dates, such as “yesterday”, “last week”, or “next week”.

## Declaration

```swift
case named
```

## Discussion

The formatter falls back to using [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/RelativeDateTimeFormatter/DateTimeStyle-swift.enum/numeric] if a name isn’t available.

## Formatting Dates and Times

- **RelativeDateTimeFormatter.DateTimeStyle.numeric**: A style that uses a numeric style to describe relative dates, such as “1 day ago” or “in 3 weeks”.
